cwitools.modeling.voigt1d¶

cwitools.modeling.voigt1d(params, x)¶

1D Voigt profile in the form f(parameters, x)

From SciPy documentation: I(x) = Re[w(z)] / (sigma * sqrt(2 * pi)) where w(z) is the Faddeeva function and z = (x + i * y) / (sqrt(2) * sigma)

Parameters

  • params (list) – 1D Voigt parameters (amplitude, sigma, gamma)

  • x (numpy.array) – The input on which to evaluate the model

Returns

The Voigt profile output

Return type

numpy.array
